successes.title: AirDog: World's First Auto-follow Drone for GoPro Camera
successes.description: AirDog: Auto-follow Drone for GoPro Camera. Designed for sports enthusiasts, outdoor fans and indie moviemakers. Shipping in August 2015.

Pledges.description:
AIRDOG CADET
You’re ready to rock AirDog? Join us. With your AirDog cadet contribution of $10 or more, you will join the ranks of AirDog enthusiasts all across the planet.
Rewards:  Up-to-the-minute information about updates and “Proud Supporter of AirDog Digital Badge” to announce on your website and across social media.

EXTRA AIRLEASH
Expand capabilities of your AirDog.
With TWO trackers you will be able to shoot two riders with one AirDog. Just press a button on AirLeash and AirDog will switch between trackers. With EXTRA AIRLEASH you can upgrade any AirDog kit to AIRDOG MASTER which allows you to gain more control of follow-me footage. Use it for creative filming and live event broadcasting. Ships together with other AirDog kits.

AIRDOG EARLYBIRD
Limit: 100
AirDog EarlyBirds can feel the thrum of the rotocopters, and the svelte contours of the AirLeash. You’re ready for this? Well we’re ready for you.

Rewards:  You’re going to receive the AirDog at this rock-bottom price (estimated retail price after the campaign will be set at $1500 USD). We’ve had to limit this offer, because we know we’re close to taking a loss. But we think it’s worth it.

AIRDOG PILOT
At this pledge level, your commitment is boundless. You clearly want AirDog to succeed. But let’s just cut to the chase. You want an AirDog.
